Permissions

Go to your Control Panel --> Content --> Web Content

Logged in as Bruno (admin) you will be able to do anything in this organization.

Logged in as Michelle (editor) you will be able to create new articles or edit the existing ones.

Logged in as Rich (publisher) you will be able to approve, expire or delete existing articles.

To modify these permissions go to Roles and then you can edit the permissions for any role or create new roles.
